thread.title: Happy 2017. Here's How B-Town Wished Everyone A Happy New Year
thread.title_full: Happy 2017. Here's How B-Town Wished Everyone A Happy New Year

title: Happy 2017. Here's How B-Town Wished Everyone A Happy New Year
text:
facebook 
It's the second day of the new year, and while we are holding on to the positivity and good vibes we cannot help but notice one thing - the whole of Bollywood is on vacation. From selfies on the beach, to enjoying firecrackers in London we saw them doing it all 
Of course, apart from giving us major vacation goals, we loved the positive vibes in all the messages. We've put together all the good wishes in the hope of making you smile on the first Monday of 2017. 
Soha Ali Khan posted this perfect couple click to wish us all (and also kind of make us jealous). A photo posted by Soha (@sakpataudi) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:30pm PST 
Bebo rang in the new year with the family. A photo posted by iDiva (@idivaofficial) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:19pm PST 
We also got a glimpse of the nawaab, Saif Ali Khan, thanks to this picture posted by Karishma Kapoor. A photo posted by KK (@therealkarismakapoor) on Dec 31, 2016 at 12:14pm PST 
Sonam Kapoor asked us to keep it real with a very cute picture with rumored boyfriend, Anand Ahuja. A photo posted by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Jan 1, 2017 at 12:22am PST 
Hrithik Roshan made us all feel bad for our house party plans with this awesome vacay pic. A photo posted by Hrithik Roshan (@hrithikroshan) on Jan 1, 2017 at 12:06am PST 
Ranveer Singh celebrated 2017 with a vacation amidst clear blue skies and the sea (with Deepika?). We would have been super jealous if he wasn't looking so darn hot in this selfie. A photo posted by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Jan 1, 2017 at 4:59am PST 
Guess how Priyanka Chopra ringed in the New Year? By going on a holiday. No surprises there. A photo posted by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Jan 1, 2017 at 2:26am PST 
John Abraham gave us some Go-To-The-Gym inspo with this video. A video posted by John Abraham (@thejohnabraham) on Jan 1, 2017 at 4:40am PST 
Amrita Arora posted a family selfie and wished us all. Fun fact: we spotted Arbaaz Khan in the picture, but Malaika Arora is missing. A photo posted by Amrita Arora (@amuaroraofficial) on Dec 31, 2016 at 10:59am PST 
Bipasha Basu posted this super adorable video with husband, Karan Singh Grover. A video posted by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Dec 31, 2016 at 6:36pm PST 
Dia Mirza spread much needed love and good vibes in the video. A video posted by Dia Mirza (@diamirzaofficial) on Jan 1, 2017 at 4:13am PST 
Harshvardhan Kapoor is looking for a positive start to the new year, just like all of us. A photo posted by Harshvardhan Kapoor (@harshvardhankapoor) on Jan 1, 2017 at 2:47am PST 
And so is Alia Bhatt. A photo posted by Alia ✨⭐️ (@aliaabhatt) on Jan 1, 2017 at 2:23am PST 
Karan Johar continues to be crazy in 2017, and we love him for it. A photo posted by Karan Johar (@karanjohar) on Dec 31, 2016 at 9:59pm PST 
Here's Shilpa Shetty sending good vibes all the way from London. A video posted by Shilpa Shetty Kundra (@officialshilpashetty) on Dec 31, 2016 at 4:47pm PST 
Varun Dhawan is partying, and he was kind enough to shoot a message for us while running into the sea. Thank you! A video posted by Varun Dhawan (@varundvn) on Jan 1, 2017 at 1:37am PST 
Our favourite girl, Sushmita Sen, is in Dubai and she has a super positive message for everyone. A photo posted by Sushmita Sen (@sushmitasen47) on Dec 31, 2016 at 7:15am PST 
While the Anushka Sharma-Virat Kohli engagement rumours seem to be untrue, the actress managed to make us smile with this cute video (from her vacation, obviously!!!) A video posted by AnushkaSharma1588 (@anushkasharma) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:43pm PST 
Virat Kohli has something similar message to say as well. A video posted by Virat Kohli (@virat.kohli) on Dec 31, 2016 at 11:49pm PST 
Jacqueline Fernandez has a totally wacky video wish for everyone. A video posted by Jacqueline Fernandez (@jacquelinef143) on Jan 1, 2017 at 3:02am PST
